O‘zbekiston—Qirg‘iziston uchrashuvi TVda ko‘rsatilmaydi. Vadim Abramov vaziyatga izoh berdi

04 Nov 2019, 23:04

O‘zbekiston terma jamoasi bosh murabbiyi Vadim Abramov 4-noyabr, dushanba kungi mashg‘ulotlardan keyin “Championat.asia” muxbirining savollariga javob qaytardi.


Foto: “Championat.asia”

Dastlab mutaxassis tayyorgarlik harayoni haqida gapirdi va keyin savvolarga javob qaytardi.
“Ishchan kayfiyatda mashg‘ulotlar o‘tkazilmoqda. Qirg‘iziston bilan nazorat bahsi, keyin esa Saudiya Arabistoni hamda Falastinga qarshi saralash bosqichi doirasidagi muhim o‘yinlar kutmoqda. Biz mazkur muhim bellashuvlarga tayyorgarlik ko‘ryapmiz”, — dedi Vadim Abramov.

— Qirg‘izistonga qarshi nazorat o‘yini TV orqali translyatsiya qilinmasligi aytilmoqda. 
Bu esa sizning tashabbusingiz bilan amalga oshirilayotgan ekan, shu rostmi?

— Shunday. Saudiya Arabistoni biz ularga qarshi qanday tayyorgarlik ko‘rayotganimizni tomosha qilishi shart emas. Qanday tayyorgarlik ko‘rayotganimiz raqibga o‘ziga xos syurpriz bo‘la qolsin. O‘yin ochiq bo‘ladi. Yaxshisi, muxlislar stadionga kelib futbol tomosha qilsin. O‘zbekiston terma jamoasini stadiondan turib qo‘llab-quvvatlasin.

— Yaqinda Stanislav Cherchesov unga telefon orqali bir muxlis nega Rossiya terma jamoasiga RPL to‘purari Shomurodovni chaqirmayotganini so‘rab to‘polon qilganini aytdi. Qiziq, sizga Cheranni nega terma jamoaga chaqirmayapsiz deb hech kim sim qoqib, to‘polon qilishga ulgurmadimi?

— Afsuski bu borada menga hech bir muxlis qo‘ng‘iroq qilgani yo‘q. Men ham Cheran borasida qo‘ng‘iroqni kutyapman. (kuladi)

— O‘zbekistonda barqaror to‘p tepayotgan Igor Golban kelasi yili O‘zbekiston pasportini olishi mumkin ekan. Agarda bu ro‘y bersa, unda Golbanning terma jamoada o‘ynash imkoniyati paydo bo‘ladimi? Sizga ushbu himoyachi ma’qulmi?

— Albatta. Aslida Golbanni men O‘zbekistonga taklif qilganman. Ma’lum vaqt Golban “Lokomotiv”da shug‘ullangan va keyinchalik men uni “Qo‘qon-1912”ga taklif qilgandim. Ajoyib himoyachi. Unda O‘zbekiston terma jamoasida o‘ynash imkoniyati paydo bo‘ladi. Shaxsan menga uning harakatlari yoqadi.

Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!

Uzbekistan-Kyrgyzstan match will not be broadcast on TV. Vadim Abramov commented on the situation

04 Nov 2019, 23:04

Uzbekistan coach Vadim Abramov answered questions of reporter Championat.asia following Monday's rehearsal.


Photo: “Championat.asia”

At first, the specialist talked about the preparation process and then answered the questions.
“We have a busy schedule. Important matches are expected in the control game with Kyrgyzstan and then in the qualifying round against Saudi Arabia and Palestine. We are preparing for these important competitions, ”said Vadim Abramov.

- It is said that the control game against Kyrgyzstan will not be broadcast on TV.
Is it true that this is being done on your own initiative?

- Yes. Saudi Arabia does not have to watch how we prepare for them. Let the opponent be surprised by how we prepare. The game will be open. It is better that the fans come to the stadium to watch football. Let the team support Uzbekistan from the stadium.

- Recently, Stanislav Cherchesov told him over the phone that a fan was asking him why he was not calling RPL scorer Shomurodov to the Russian team. Ever wondered why you didn't call Cheran on the national team before he hit the ball?

- Unfortunately, no fans have called me in this regard. I'm also waiting for a call from Cheran. (laughs)

- Igor Golban, who has a stable ball in Uzbekistan, will be able to get his passport next year. If that happens, will Golban have a chance to play for the national team? Do you like this defender?

- Of course. In fact, I invited Golban to Uzbekistan. For a time, Golban was involved in the Locomotive and I later invited him to Kokand 1912. Great defender. It will have a chance to play for the national team of Uzbekistan. Personally, I like his actions.
